column5: Our CIM-accredited Marketing (Social Marketing) MSc explores the nuances of marketing for the wider benefit of society, preparing you for a marketing career in the public sector, health authorities, charities, NGOs and social marketing consultancies. On the course, you will learn both theory and practice of marketing at an advanced level, providing you with an in-depth, critical understanding of research methodologies, and marketing planning and strategy.You will understand how to use the motivations of target audiences to plan programmes that influence, and ultimately change, behaviourFull-time students also have the option to add work experience to their Masters through a year’s paid placement in industry.
